lines.text: Trust a snake before a whore, and a whore before Mahbub Ali!
What's the matter? Don't you want to be a white boy?

[Speaking to the unborn child in Indra's belly]
Do you not want to be born, little brother? It's really not so bad out here. All you have to do is be quick - and a little bit wicked - and you'll be as happy as Kim.
